featured.text: The old houses will soon be and rebuilt because of the severe damage caused by the earthquake.
With such support, spiritual leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei vowed, “We will rebuild Bam stronger than before.” 45.
A few hotels are still being rebuilt, but Kauai remains as beautiful as ever.
In 1945, devastated from the war, the country set about establishing a cheap industry that could rebuild its economy.

definition.zh_def: 重建；重新建立或修復某物。
definition.en_def: To build something again after it has been damaged or destroyed.
definition.example: After the hurricane, the community came together to rebuild the damaged homes.
